title: All Verso Outfits in Clair Obscur: Expedition 33 and how to unlock them

html:
Image: Sandfall Interactive/Kepler Interactive

Jazz Stewart is a Gaming Journalist and multimedia creator passionate about storytelling and game design. When he isn’t writing, he’s gaming; when he’s not gaming, he wishes he were.

Verso is more than just a Devil May Cry stand-in. In Clair Obscur: Expedition 33, Verso’s combat playstyle evokes this feeling of style, but style doesn’t have to stop at combat. With the right fit, you can defeat the paintress in style. Verso’s outfits unlock many combinations of expression.

As you play Clair Obscur: Expedition 33, you’ll find both outfits and hairstyles to experiment with. Many of them will be directly in your path, but many of them are missable — hidden behind Mimes, side quests, or complex challenges.

In this Clair Obscur: Expedition 33 guide, we offer a list of all Verso outfits and hairstyles and how to unlock them.

Table of Contents

  • All Verso outfits in Clair Obscur: Expedition 33
  • All Verso hairstyles in Clair Obscur: Expedition 33

All Verso outfits in Clair Obscur: Expedition 33

1/8

Image: Sandfall Interactive/Kepler Interactive via Polygon

There are 12 outfits you can unlock for Verso. We’ve only unlocked eight so far, though, we can confirm through community sources how to unlock the other four. Included above are screenshots of the Verso outfits we’ve unlocked to date, with an asterisk (*) below to indicate those we’ve yet to unlock.

Here’s how you unlock the following Verso outfits in Clair Obscur: Expedition 33:

  1. Verso — Available from the beginning of the game.
  2. Baguette — Defeat the Mime in the Joy sub-section of Visages.
  3. Expedition — Unlocks automatically once you reach Act 2.
  4. Civilian* — Found in the Manor. Access the Manor through the continent north of Lost Woods once you unlock swimming with Esquie, and it’s behind a secret door you find after checking the upstairs bookcase.
  5. Clair* — Complete Stage 11, Trial 3 in Endless Tower.
  6. Pelerin* — Purchase from Verogo the Merchant in Frozen Hearts.
  7. Pure — Purchase from Granasori the Merchant on the island next to the Monolith.
  8. Renoir’s Suit — Defeat Renoir in the Monolith.
  9. Sakapatate — Purchase from Delsitra the Merchant in Gestral Village.
  10. Simple — Purchase from Rubiju the Merchant on the island next to the Visages on the World Map.
  11. Swimsuit I — Reach relationship level 6 with Sciel.
  12. Swimsuit II* — Achieve the Gold Medal in the Time Trial at Gestral Beach.

All Verso hairstyles in Clair Obscur: Expedition 33

1/5

Image: Sandfall Interactive/Kepler Interactive via Polygon

There are 10 hairstyles you can unlock for Verso. Similar to his outfits, we’ve only unlocked five, but through the community, we have confirmed how to unlock the other six. We’ve included screenshots of the Verso hairstyles we’ve unlocked so far, and have added an asterisk (*) below to indicate those we’ve yet to unlock.

Here’s how you unlock the following Verso hairstyles in Clair Obscur: Expedition 33:

  1. Verso — Available from the beginning of the game.
  2. Bald* — Defeat the Mime in Sunless Cliffs with Verso.
  3. Curly* — Purchase from Sodasso the Merchant, northwest of Visages.
  4. Gustave’s Haircut — Purchase from Papasso the Merchant on the beach next to Monoco’s Station.
  5. Baguette — Defeat the Mime in the Joy section of Visages.
  6. Bun — Purchase from Blackora the Merchant next to Monoco’s Station.
  7. Expedition White* — Complete Stage 9, Trial 3 of Endless Tower.
  8. Gestral* — Received from Sastro once you find 5 Lost Gestrals.
  9. Samurai — Reach relationship level 3 with Monoco and select “Fine” when you’re able during the dialogue.
  10. Renoir Haircut* — Get the Verso ending at the end of the game. You must choose “Fight as Verso” in the final battle.

For more Clair Obscur: Expedition 33 guides, here’s our recommendation for how to get all endings.
